meta.description: Many pet parents don't realize that vaccinations don't always result in immunization - titer tests determine if an animal is protected or not.

title: Is Your Vaccinated Pet Protected From Disease?
cleaned_text: Some veterinarians are stepping away from the narrative, hoping to encourage their colleagues to be more open to antibody titer testing in lieu of repeated re-vaccinations of cats and dogs

opengraph.title: Is Your Vaccinated Pet Protected From Disease?
opengraph.description: Many pet parents don't realize that vaccinations don't always result in immunization - titer tests determine if an animal is protected or not.
